pageContext.claim: “Many thousands of people work for our government. With that said, a former DISGRUNTLED EMPLOYEE named Miles Taylor, who I do not know (never heard of him), said he left & is on the open arms Fake News circuit. Said to be a real 'stiff'. They will take anyone against us!”
pageContext.analysis: Miles Taylor was chief of staff at the Department of Homeland Security and posed for photos with Trump in the Oval Office. Taylor tweeted a photo in response to this tweet.
